verses.text: O sing unto the \sc Lord\sc* a new song; For he hath done marvellous \add things:\add* His right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.
The \sc Lord\sc* hath made known his salvation: His righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen.
He hath remembered his mercy and his truth toward the house of Israel: All the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
Make a joyful noise unto the \sc Lord\sc*, all the earth: Make a loud noise, and rejoice, and sing \add praise\add*.
Sing unto the \sc Lord\sc* with the harp; With the harp, and the voice of a psalm.
With trumpets and sound of cornet Make a joyful noise before the \sc Lord\sc*, the King.
Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof; The world, and they that dwell therein.
Let the floods clap \add their\add* hands: Let the hills be joyful together
Before the \sc Lord\sc*; for he cometh to judge the earth: With righteousness shall he judge the world, And the people with equity.
